column4: Ubuntu is failing to install... giving getpwuid_r() "failed due to unkwon user id"

are you booting live cd from a usb car?
boot into ubuntu from your usb, then use gpart to set up your partitions, then reboot and i nstead of booting into ubunto arrow to the install option
Ubuntu wont boot, it get stuck in "user id unknown"
did you download 32 bit or 64 bit?

how did you install it to your usb?
